Description: Vapour pressure difference between the surface and the saturated air vapour pressure
Slope of the saturation vapor pressure at air temperature
Air CO₂ concentration at the leaf surface
Absorned net shortwave radiation (PAR + NIR). Often computed from a light interception model
Absorbed longwave radiation flux (TIR) also called net flux between the object and the atmosphere
View factor between the object and the sky for both faces (0-2)
